text: Thanks everyone for looking into this. I will share this information with my client.

Has anyone successfully delayed submission of a HubSpot form? We have some code running onSubmit but the form keeps submitting before the code finishes which is an issue, so we were hoping to stop the form’s normal submission and instead have clicking ‘submit’ trigger our code, wait for it to finish, and then trigger the actual submission.

The boilerplate does not use jQuery.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate#jquery|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate#jquery>

Thank you for providing the info on how to test if jquery is present. #teamworkmakesthedreamwork

Happy Friday
